info.description: API system for Trekkstay - Hotel Booking System
info.title: Trekkstay - Hotel Booking System API

post.description: Create new hotel employee account, require hotel owner permission and hotel profile already created
Login hotel employee by email and password
Create new hotel room, requires authentication with owner role

get.description: Filter hotel room in a hotel

patch.description: Update hotel room, requires authentication with owner role

post.description: Create new hotel, requires authentication with owner role

patch.description: Update hotel, requires authentication with owner role

get.description: List all districts of a province
List all wards of a district
Get new access token and refresh token

post.description: Upload media files to the server and store them in AWS S3
Login user by email and password
Reset password and send new password to email
